title: RCASD Gate Result
description: Schema for lifecycle gate check results. Gates enforce quality requirements at stage boundaries in the RCASD-IVTR pipeline.

stageId.description: Reference to the lifecycle stage this gate belongs to

gateName.description: Name of the gate check (e.g., prerequisites-met, code-complete)

checkedBy.description: Agent or user who performed the check

details.description: Additional details about the check result
